title: Prologue of function missing in FatLTO but present in ThinLTO

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Compiling with branch-target-enforcement = 1(`-Zbranch-protection=bti`) on `aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu` causes different code to emitted in the prologue of the function for fat LTO and thin LTO in **debug** mode. Baseline assembly for function add defined as follows: ```rust #[no_mangle] pub extern "C" fn add(left: usize, right: usize) -> usize { left.wrapping_add(right) } ``` compiled into a `cdylib`. ## [DEBUG] llvm-objdump on ThinLTO ```asm 0000000000010408 : 10408: d503245f bti c ; not present in FatLTO 1040c: d10043ff sub sp, sp, #16 10410: 8b010008 add x8, x0, x1 10414: f90007e8 str x8, [sp, #8] 10418: 14000001 b 0x1041c 1041c: f94007e0 ldr x0, [sp, #8] 10420: 910043ff add sp, sp, #16 10424: d65f03c0 ret ``` ### [DEBUG] llvm-objdump on FatLTO ```asm 0000000000010408 : 10408: d10043ff sub sp, sp, #16 1040c: 8b010008 add x8, x0, x1 10410: f90007e8 str x8, [sp, #8] 10414: 14000001 b 0x10418 10418: f94007e0 ldr x0, [sp, #8] 1041c: 910043ff add sp, sp, #16 10420: d65f03c0 ret ``` ### [RELEASE] llvm-objdump on both FatLTO and ThinLTO ```asm 0000000000010238 : 10238: d503245f bti c 1023c: 8b000020 add x0, x1, x0 10240: d65f03c0 ret ``` # rustc version with failure first occuring: ``` rustc 1.65.0-nightly (75b7e52e9 2022-08-13) binary: rustc commit-hash: 75b7e52e92c3b00fc891b47f5b2efdff0a2be55a commit-date: 2022-08-13 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.65.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.0 ``` # cargo-bisect-rustc searched nightlies: from nightly-2022-08-12 to nightly-2022-08-14 regressed nightly: nightly-2022-08-13 searched commit range: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/compare/20ffea6938b5839c390252e07940b99e3b6a889a...f22819bcce4abaff7d1246a56eec493418f9f4ee regressed commit: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/commit/e2b52ff73edc8b0b7c74bc28760d618187731fe8
bisected with cargo-bisect-rustc v0.6.4 Host triple: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu Reproduce with: ```bash cargo bisect-rustc --start=2022-08-12 --end=2022-08-14 --script=test.sh --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu ```
## Might be related to: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/102162 as reverting the same [patches](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/102162#issuecomment-1279642757) in that issue solves the problem.
